title: Ammonium Persulphate
description: A strong oxidizing agent used in various industrial applications.

title: Sodium Persulphate
description: Used as a bleaching agent and an etchant for printed circuit boards.

title: Ammonium Sulphate
description: An efficient fertilizer for various soil types and industrial uses.

title: Potassium Persulphate
description: Commonly used in polymerization, etching, and soil conditioning.
